wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Ripping off Metrowerks' IP isn't OK. I'm sure the lawyers at Freescale won't be happy either.
Shades of James Plamondon's co-opting of my System 7.5 Sucks Less shirts.
I guess this is how Microsoft conducts business as usual?
